lead_paragraph: WILLENSKY--Miriam. Age 92, died January 21, 2016. Devoted mother of Allison (Don) and Nathan (Barbara). Generous, kind and loving grandmother to Regina and Gussie. Graveside service January 31, 2016 Hollywood Forever Cemetery. Contact Hollywood Funeral Home, 323-304-6060 for details. 1/3
